channel.title: coding on Sun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in coding on Sun's Blog

item.title: DNS污染？
item.description: 这个站刚刚开放了3天，把我折腾的不行，刚刚又发现了点不对的地方，访问网站的时候某些json不能正确的加载导致动画不会出现。 (index):52 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource 'https://sundingyi.com/styles/owlCarousel.min.fb3b2db7ac73c4ba8d021450bcf5556ff7385dfd0c1ee5fb4a69c75f41f2fd29.css' with computed SHA-256 integrity 'sfJuKcQ8Yf6LWm8iW07nxflpp7M8/lEnBiceByRtk9E='. The resource has been blocked. (index):1 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource 'https://sundingyi.com/js/bundle.02b6288fcd4c358451657f10dc5ff7760229d03df75243bce75eeed353f4f935.js' with computed SHA-256 integrity '5pNOadBruKITE09MFGj5R4u3dV54bftg48WpF8UzWAU='. The resource has been blocked. (index):1 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource 'https://sundingyi.com/js/bundleOwlCarousel.84c001859cd27dd29f730ab6e2a17834f2614cd035b5b887dcd252aeeda3c3a0.js' with computed SHA-256 integrity 'r8y2Zf/d+SEBqLwEuSSkpbmjbArQrWECTadRzdj9Htk='. The resource has been blocked.
